analyzers.abstract_stage module¶

class analyzers.abstract_stage.AbstractStage(stage_config)¶

Bases: object

do_stage(message)¶

This method takes message object, proccesses it, and appends attributes with results to it. :param message: message object with fieds for processing. For example, if you need grab object for stage, you must take it from message.grab_obj :return: message, enriched with results

finish_batch()¶

This method is used in bulk write operation to flush results :return:

init_stage()¶

Do model init in this method, save model to self :return: nothing

set_consumer_name(consumer_name)¶
set_logger(logger)¶
shutdown()¶

This method is used for graceful stage shutdown :return: nothing
